Variable.Name: InActiveGrpMemberLoginError
Variable.Value: UserName has no active roles in GrpName group.

Variable.Name: UserModifyErrMsg
Variable.Value: You can not deactivate the user's last role from his/her default group. RoleName is the last active role of the user UserName in his/her default group.

Variable.Name: UserDeleteErrMsg
Variable.Value: User is referenced by Signoff objects and hence cannot be deleted. User can be deactivated by changing the user status to inactive.

Variable.Name: RemoveUserErrMsg
Variable.Value: Delete member failed User is referenced by Signoff objects and hence cannot be deleted. User can be deactivated by changing the user status to inactive.

Variable.Name: ImportTemplateErrMsg
Variable.Value: Check if the used template contains the appropriate tags. Data sheets need to contain the start, end and rule tags. Instruction sheets need to contain the ignore tags. Refer to the user guide for more details on tag usage in templates.
